resources.string: Support
Your license was successfully verified.
You don\'t seem to own a license to this app
This app could not be found on Google Play and as such your license could not be verified. This is not your fault. Please report this issue to our support at support@fireamp.eu
An error has occurred on Google\'s licensing server.
Google\'s licensing server refused to confirm your license because the rate limit was exceeded
There was an error contacting Google\'s licensing server.

This app seems to have an invalid package name. The license cannot be checked. This is an internal error and not your fault. Please report this issue to our support using the e-mail support@fireamp.eu
Google\'s licensing server failed to determine your Google account. Your app license couldn\'t be checked because of this.
It seems like you haven\'t installed Google Play Services. These services are necessary to confirm that you\'ve purchased our app.
Your license was confirmed, but there was an internal error and the licensing data could not be found.
The app\'s public key used for the signature verification of the licensing is invalid. This is not your fault. Please report this to support@fireamp.eu
The permission allowing to check your license is missing. Please report this issue to support@fireamp.eu
Google\'s licesning server responded with invalid data.
Google\'s licensing server responded with an unknown response code. Please report this to support@fireamp.eu.
To use the support feature, please connect your device to the internet
Welcome to Fireamp Support!
Back
Sign-up

Here you can create a prioritized support account. Sign-up and you will receive an e-mail shortly after to set your password. After that you can use the account e-mail to send your support inquiry to support@fireamp.eu or alternatively log-in under the website https://support.fireamp.eu and receive prioritized support. Both methods can directly be accessed here:
Created successfully
The token is invalid
Account could not be created. Are the entered email and name valid? Does an account with that e-mail maybe already exist?
Google proof is from the future. This should not be possible.
Google licensing proof is not recent enough. Is your internet exceptionally slow?
This purchase was already used to create a prioritized account.
Please enter an e-mail and a password.
Google licensing proof has wrong response code.
Google licesing proof is for the wrong package.
Google licensing proof has wrong nonce
Google licensing proof has wrong format
The challenge expired. Please try again.
Google licensing proof signature is invalid.
Your prioritized account was created!

Your account was created. You will receive an e-mail shortly that asks you to set a password. Follow the steps given there, to complete the account setup. After this, you will be able to reach our support either by e-mail to support@fireamp.eu or over the web at our website https://support.fireamp.eu. Both of these options can be opened here:
"By signing up, I accept the "
